title: Interpretation of seeing swollen hair in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of hair pulling in a dream or a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, or Imam Al-Sadiq via the vision website Roy2a.com of hair pulling in reality is one of the recurring visions that I have, and I see hair pulling in a dream that can indicate goodness, or It could be a warning or a warning against the appearance of evil, and interpreters have differed in interpreting the vision of hair pulling, whether it is a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, with its different meanings. Or Ibn Kathir, or Al-Nabulsi, or Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of Ibn Shirin’s vision of puffy hair in a dream? Seeing hair pulling in a dream is a sign of distress and sadness. Dreaming of pulling evil in an engaged girl’s dream. Statement of canceling the engagement. Dreaming of pulling hair in a dream for a married woman, warning of her husband’s betrayal. Vision Hair being pulled in a dream by someone you know is a sign of a lot of unrest between them. Dreaming of pulling one’s sister’s hair in a dream is a sign that a lot of food and goodness will arrive for the pioneer. Seeing a married woman pulling her hair is a sign of instability in marital life. See also: Interpretation of seeing hair being pulled from the ear in a dream. What is it? Interpretation of a dream about plucking my sister’s hair? Dreaming about plucking one’s sister’s hair in a dream is a sign that you will obtain a lot of money. Seeing a girl pulling her hair is evidence of resolving crises and the end of problems. If a girl sees that she is pulling her hair and her sister is tall, this is a sign of increased financial gains. Dreaming of pulling her sister’s tangled hair is a sign of A lot of disturbances among them. See also: Interpretation of seeing hair falling out in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream of a woman pulling my hair? Dreaming of a woman pulling her hair in a dream is a sign of major changes in the dreamer’s life. Dreaming of a woman pulling her hair and it falling out is a sign of weakness. What is the interpretation of a dream of touching Ibn Sirin’s hair? Dreaming of touching hair in a single girl’s dream is evidence of an approaching happy marriage. Seeing someone you know in an unmarried girl’s dream touching her hair is a symbol of his love for her in reality. A man’s dream of touching a woman’s hair is a sign of his love for her. Seeing someone touching a man’s hair in a dream is evidence of the presence of someone trying to achieve His dreams are at the expense of the dreamer. See also: Interpretation of seeing a hair clip in a dream. What is the interpretation of a married woman pulling her hair? Seeing a married woman pulling her hair in a dream is a sign that you are going through many sorrows and problems. Pulling a married woman’s hair in a dream is evidence that there are many problems between her and her husband. A dream of a husband pulling his wife’s hair is evidence of many crises in their lives. What is the interpretation of seeing a divorced woman pulling her hair in a dream? Seeing a divorced woman pulling her hair in a dream symbolizes her ex-husband’s attempt to restrict her. A dream of pulling hair in a divorced woman’s dream is evidence of her fear of entering into new relationships. See also: Interpretation of seeing a hairdresser in a dream. On the website, we are pleased to see the reception of your dream about “Interpretation of the vision “Hair pulling” through comments, and the dream team will interpret your dream, respond and communicate with you.

title: Interpretation of a dream about someone who wants to bewitch me according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about someone who wants to bewitch me has multiple meanings. Sorcery is mentioned in the Qur’an, which means that it exists and we can never deny it, and it has serious harm to health, as the Lord of the Worlds taught us. But fortunately, medicine exists, and the Holy Qur’an is what protects us from the evil of sorcery, and we will learn about all the concepts according to the opinion of our honorable scholars, such as Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a person who wants to perform magic. What is the interpretation of a dream about a person who wants to perform magic? When the dreamer sees this dream, he must know that Surrounded by hypocrites who do not show him what they hide, but rather rush to harm him without him knowing it, here he must be more careful in his life and surrender. Completely in the company of these people. The vision may also indicate that there is a person in the dreamer’s life who always enchants him until he gets hurt in his life, so he should never leave the memory of God and should follow his memories morning and evening. These actions, whatever they may be. The vision serves as a warning to the dreamer that he must be careful in any matter and not divulge his secrets in front of others. The dream may lead to a problem with some people and they always seek to harm the dreamer without stopping, or they may seek to create permanent problems with his wife if he is married. . If he keeps the Book of God, this anxiety will disappear from his life forever. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of “Who wants to bewitch me?” Ibn Sirin believes that the dream has bad connotations in the dreamer’s life, but if he approaches God and performs his duties without negligence, this will not harm him Never evil. The vision may lead to psychological and physical exhaustion resulting from multiple experiences during these days, but he will be able to get out of it with God’s grace and satisfaction. The dream could be an explanation of his life away from his Lord and a reminder to him of the necessity of getting closer to the Lord of the Worlds and abandoning all the pleasures that distract him from Worship, so his life will be better and better. In advance. If the dreamer sees in a dream that one of his relatives is bewitching him, then in reality there are many problems between him and his relatives. Seeing the place of bewitchment during sleep is evidence of getting rid of the sins and transgressions that fill his life and changing his behavior and bad behavior to what is good for him. You have a dream that confuses you, Wait for it.. Google Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site Interpretation of a dream about a person who wants to be bewitched Perhaps the dream indicates her connection to a pagan person who causes her many problems and harms her in various ways, and here she must leave him immediately to find great wealth with another person. The vision expresses the necessity of repenting from sins and staying away from The forbidden path that you are taking and you will not achieve happiness if it remains as it is, but rather it will be better and better. This vision leads to evil, so the girl cannot leave herself like this without the memory of God protecting her, because if she has magic she will not be able to get out of it, so she must continue In remembering his Lord without saying no. Negligence until God protects her from the evil of envy. If she sees that one of her friends is bewitching her, then she should know her friends, as there are also those who are trying to harm her in different ways. Perhaps the vision indicates that there is some controversy surrounding her and she should stay away from it completely so that she can live her life without any

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a dead king in a dream?

preview.html: Seeing a dead king in a dream: The presence of a dead king in a dream is something special and contains many good signs that create a bright future for the monarch and grant him the wishes he desires, God willing, but do all interpretations have this meaning? This is explained in the article below... Follow us: Seeing a dead king in a dream is considered a good dream that increases the dreamer’s chances of getting what he wants. Leading interpretation scholars believe that seeing a dead king in a dream means that the dreamer will receive a large inheritance or profit. Great soon, and God knows best. The presence of a dead king in a dream is good evidence of attaining high positions and attaining the position that the dreamer was hoping for. Some other scholars also explained that seeing a dead king sad in a dream means that the dreamer should give alms to the poor and help them as much as possible. If The dreamer saw in a dream that he was sitting with a dead angel in the dream, so the dreamer must be more careful because his time is near and God knows best. Seeing a dead king in a dream by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin indicated that seeing a dead king in a dream indicates goodness and benefits that will be the dreamer’s wealth. In his life, and that he worshiped the comfort and tranquility that he had always sought. Whoever intends to travel and sees in a dream that the king has died, it is interpreted that God will bless him on this journey and he will have a great share of joy and pleasures. This vision also indicates obtaining a new and improved job opportunity. The individual’s material life, God willing. Whoever dreams of a dead angel in front of him is a sign of victory over enemies and salvation from them. If a person dreams that he is eating with a dead king, this is a good sign that he will obtain a high position at work. As for seeing a dead king with his face frowning or sad, it is It symbolizes that the dreamer is far from God and does not perform his religious duties continuously. Seeing a dead king in an unmarried woman’s dream. Seeing a dead king in a dream with a defect means that the dreamer has great energy and can plan her future well and easily achieve the goals she has set for herself. When the dreamer finds a dead king In a dream, this is a sign of independence and a great ability to solve crises and manage the affairs of her life. When a girl in a dream shakes hands with a dead king, it is interpreted that she will reduce the consequences she faces in life and achieve all the dreams and desires she wants. If Panam saw that a dead king was wearing a crown On her head, this indicates that she will be able to reach high positions at an early age by God’s command. When the deceased king gives a valuable gift to the pioneer, this is a sign that the relative will marry a young man who has great status among the people, and that he will live with him with great joy and prosperity. If Seeing people crying a lot over the dead king indicates that he was a person who loved good for people and worked with them, and may God reward him well for his good deeds. Seeing a dead king in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a dead king in a married woman’s dream means that the dreamer will receive great benefits and facilities from God and that her life will be Better than before. As indicated by E

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing lettuce in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing lettuce in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of the dream of lettuce in a dream in detail. Lettuce is considered one of the most widespread types of vegetables around the world and is an essential component in the making of the salads that every person on Earth treats. There are different types of lettuce in shape, size, and color. Lettuce is... The most important nutritious vegetable, lettuce contains many vitamins and has many benefits and uses in human life. Lettuce contains vitamin C, because it greatly helps reduce the risk of many chronic diseases such as heart problems, seizures, and arterial thrombosis, as well as cancer. Interpretation of a dream about lettuce by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin interprets seeing lettuce in a dream as symbolizing the general good in Sometimes and evil at other times. In a dream about growing lettuce in his home, his dream indicates bad news that the dreamer hears, but this bad news will be followed by great joy. Interpretation of a dream about seeing lettuce in a dream indicates that the dreamer is in good health and does not suffer from any disease. For whoever saw it In his dream that he is eating lettuce, his vision is not worthy of praise, because it indicates the dreamer’s illness in the coming days. Also, eating lettuce in a dream sometimes indicates separation between the dreamer and one of his relatives in life, because he leaves the beloved or relative. Eating lettuce in a dream also It indicates that the dreamer suffers from a lack of food and needs more nutrition, so he must be careful and pay more attention to his health than he does. But if a woman sees that lettuce in her dreams turns black, then her dream is not worthy of praise, which It indicates that this woman is sick with a disease that is the cause of this disease. Interpretation of the dream of seeing lettuce by Al-Nabulsi: The great scholar Al-Nabulsi explained that seeing lettuce in a dream is evidence of an easy and simple life. Seeing lettuce growing in a dream is evidence of crises that the dreamer can hardly overcome. Seeing yourself Buying lettuce in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s bad actions that will harm him. A man who sees lettuce in a dream is evidence that he will establish dishonest relationships. Interpretation of a dream about lettuce for a single woman: Seeing lettuce growing in a dream for a girl is evidence that you are hearing very bad news, but This news will be followed by joy and happiness. Seeing a girl buying lettuce is evidence of the goodness that God honors in her life, her joy and happiness, and a sign that the girl will achieve her ambitions and goals in life and a sign that she has a lot of money. Seeing pieces of lettuce in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence that she You will be able to get rid of them and get rid of all the problems and crises that she will face in her life. Seeing lettuce growing in a girl’s dream is evidence of her determination to achieve her goals in life. Interpretation of a dream about lettuce for a married woman: Seeing lettuce in a married woman’s dream is evidence that that woman is in good health and free from Diseases. The interpretation of a dream about seeing lettuce growing in a married woman’s dream is evidence of someone who wants her illness from those close to her, but he will find out about this person. Seeing growing black lettuce indicates

title: Distributing meat as charity in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the distribution of meat as charity in a dream of an unmarried girl If a single woman sees raw meat in a dream, this means that she is going through difficult problems that have affected her, and God knows best. This dream also indicates her steadfastness and patience until her judgment ends, God willing. Seeing in a dream the distribution of uncooked meat to single women. A sign of the weakness she feels with a loss of self-confidence as a result of a previous emotional relationship that affected her psyche. This dream shows the single woman that she needs to get rid of this feeling that surrounds her. When an unmarried woman sees in a dream cooking and distributing meat, this is a sign that the worries she is experiencing will go away, God willing. As indicated by cooked meat and its distribution, it indicates the arrival of news that pleases God Almighty, I know. As for if the girl sees that he cuts the meat and then distributes it. A sign of consideration towards the person they are in a relationship with, if they are already in a relationship, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about cutting red meat, the intention of a married woman Interpretation of seeing the distribution of meat as charity in a dream for a married woman When a married woman distributes cooked meat in a dream. Evidence that she lives in Satisfaction and happiness in her married life and that contentment stems from her husband’s faith. As for distributing meat in exchange for a married woman in a dream, it is a sign of paying off debts, and that God gives her money, and God knows best. When you see in your dream uncooked meat for a married woman, this is a sign of pregnancy soon, God willing, I know. Interpretation of seeing the distribution of meat as charity in a dream for a man and its meaning If a man sees cooked meat in a dream, this indicates good and upcoming money. But if he sees uncooked meat, this is evidence of distress, God knows. While seeing pork indicates poverty, God knows best. Read also: Distributing raw meat in a dream to single, married, pregnant and divorced women The meaning of seeing the distribution of meat as charity in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation Seeing a pregnant woman distributing spoiled and inedible meat is a sign that she is in a health crisis. But if she sees that she is distributing meat to the poor, this is good news that she will give birth easily, God willing. This dream also foretells her of the future child who will have a share, God knows best. But if he sees a lot of meat in a dream and does not want to share it, this is a sign that he should Charity. Interpretation of seeing the distribution of meat as charity in a dream for young people and its meaning When a single person sees himself distributing uncooked meat, this is evidence of the approaching marriage, but it will fail, God knows best. Seeing the distribution of meat also indicates the end of problems related to work. However, if he sees spoiled meat that is inedible in a dream, this is a sign that he is in a real crisis. Dreaming of a young man distributing meat to the needy is good news of abundant sustenance, God knows best. When a young man sees a butcher eating his meat and then distributing it in a dream, this is a sign of this young man’s happiness and kindness. You may be interested: Meat in a dream for a married, single and pregnant woman Different indications of a dream about meat

Marriage is approaching, but it will fail, and God knows best. The vision of distributing meat also indicates the end of problems related to work. However, if he sees rotten, inedible meat in a dream, this is a sign that he is in a real crisis. To dream of a young man distributing meat to those in need is good news of abundant sustenance, and God I know. When a young man sees the butcher eating his meat and then distributing it in a dream, this is a sign of this young man’s happiness and kindness. You may be interested: Eating meat in a dream for a married, single, or pregnant woman. Various indicators of a dream about meat.

title: Interpretation of madness in a dream

preview.html: The crazy person in a dream for single people: Seeing a crazy man following you in a dream. The crazy person in a dream according to Imam al-Sadiq. Interpretation of losing one’s mind in a dream. Seeing a crazy person in a dream according to Imam al-Sadiq. Seeing a crazy person in a dream. Seeing a crazy woman in a dream. Seeing crazy people in a dream. Madness. If a person dreams that he is crazy, this indicates the presence of a problem that he is dealing with. It also threatens a disease that will lead to the loss of your property. If you see others suffering from madness, this indicates the inconsistency of friends and a sad end to hopes. If a girl dreams of madness, this indicates disappointment in marriage and wealth. Interpretation of seeing madness in a dream. If an unmarried girl sees madness in a dream, this means disappointment and failure to achieve what she wants. Seeing a mad girl in a dream means that the owners of this house are rich and that the owner of the vision is good. If a girl sees that she is crazy in a dream, this means that someone will propose to her. If a married woman sees that she is crazy in a dream, this indicates an improvement in her situation with her husband, and this dream may indicate that she will become pregnant soon. If a pregnant woman sees that she Crazy in a dream, this means an easy birth for that woman, or it may indicate that she will give birth to a male child, and only God knows what is in the wombs. But if the pregnant woman sees that she is extremely crazy or doing harmful things, this may indicate that she is pregnant with a child, or it may indicate difficulty. The birth of that woman. Dream interpreters also say that madness in a dream indicates a large sum of money, but it shows that its owner spends it without wisdom or spends it on doing evil. Madness in a dream can be interpreted as an inheritance, as some dream interpreters say that madness in a dream It indicates the acquisition of a rule or authority. The Nabulsi scholar says about seeing insanity in a dream, that it indicates the state of wealth in which the person with this vision lives, and insanity can refer to the world and joys. It is also said in the interpretation of insanity in a dream that it indicates the consumption of usury, and it may Some interpreters say: Seeing madness in a dream means that its owner will enter Paradise. Madness in a dream generally refers to money that is spent in the wrong way, and this is the point of view of many dream interpreters. Seeing a boy mad in a dream indicates love, or it may indicate beating, or The boy's madness may also indicate that the father of that boy is well-off. If a person is described in a dream as crazy and this person is earning from something, then this vision indicates that he is earning forbidden money. And if one sees himself suffering from epilepsy from madness and loses awareness of his behavior, This indicates that this person is going through some kind of distress or a major problem in his life, or that he is exposed to witchcraft, or a misfortune may befall him. If the dreamer sees that there is a crazy man following him and does not harm him, this indicates that the dreamer is saved from the betrayal of enemies. A group of dream interpreters says Seeing madness in a dream indicates many aspects, including a treacherous king, justice in religion, an impudent man, and the presence of an enemy or oppressor, as it has many different interpretations. Everyone who sees madness in a dream indicates many aspects.

title: Prison in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: If he is sitting inside the prison, this is a clear indication of the many fears and judgments he is going through, so stay with us to learn more interpretations through the interpreter’s website. Interpretation of seeing prison in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream, she enters prison in a dream, and she She is very sad and alone. She remembers the bad things that affect her from the environment in which she lives and she feels very lonely and sad. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream means that she is sitting in prison for a long time in a dream and she is sad. The meaning indicates that this single girl will face many things The bad that she lives and goes through. And if an unmarried girl was sentenced to prison in a dream, and she was sitting in it, and it was very dark and in a bad condition. The meaning indicates that this unmarried girl will live a very bad life and she will not be able to get rid of it easily. And the unmarried girl who saw In a dream, she will enter prison and she is trying to get out of it in a dream. It explains to you many of the problems and worries that she lives and faces, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about escaping from the police. Interpretation of seeing prison in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman saw in a dream that she was looking at prison In a dream and she tries not to enter him in the dream. It indicates the bad life that this married woman sees from the outside and she tries not to enter it, and God knows best. And if the married woman saw that her husband was in prison in the dream, then he is very sad and feels lonely. The meaning indicates that this woman The married woman is going through a difficult period in her life with her husband. As for the married woman who sees in the dream, she sees the prison in a dream and she was sitting in it in the dream. It indicates that this married woman will live in problems and fears for a long time and this will affect her. And if a married woman in a dream looks at the prison and it is closed And she cannot get out of it in a dream. This is an indication that this married woman will go through many bad things that will bother her for a long time. Interpretation of seeing prison in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman dreams that she stays in prison for a long time in the dream while she is sad. It indicates many bad things that This divorced woman will see it in her life during this time. And if the divorced woman sees the prison in a dream, and tries not to enter it in the dream while she is afraid. The meaning indicates that this divorced woman will go through bad circumstances in her life that affect her. And the divorced dreamer who sees in the dream that she is looking for a prison in the dream to escape. And she is afraid of him. This is an indication that she is doing many wrong things in her life during this time and that she is very sad, and God knows best. Either a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is looking at the prison and she looked very bad in the dream and was far from it. This indicates that this woman The divorced woman will succeed in getting rid of all the problems she is going through and experiencing. Read also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing terrorism in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a prison in a dream for a man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he sees a prison in a dream

title: Wearing a dress in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Seeing an unmarried woman wearing a suitable dress is a sign that she will enter a world that she has wanted for a long time, as it explains a happy and peaceful life, sustenance and kindness for her, and indicates the fulfillment of her aspirations. And goals. Interpretation of seeing a dress in a dream for a single girl. Wearing a long dress in a dream shows her purity and chastity in life and society, God willing. Seeing her wearing a white dress is evidence of her great religiosity in life and her closeness to God. If the dress she is wearing is black, this means that she will fall She is in great distress in her life. Seeing yourself wearing a blue dress in a dream indicates a peaceful and happy life that she is living. And if she is looking for a dress to wear, this indicates that she has fallen into a matter that she is very reluctant to decide on. An unmarried woman who sees someone wearing a dress for her Wearing it indicates the date of her engagement. If she is wearing a wedding dress in the dream, this indicates her big dream for this moment in her life. An unmarried woman who wears many dresses in a dream shows her dream with many aspirations for her. Seeing her wearing a dress in a dream means that she is entering into A new relationship at this time in her life. You may be interested in: Interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a fiancée. Interpretation of seeing a married woman wearing a dress in a dream. If a married woman wears a short dress in front of people, then she is forbidden in life. It showed that he did something wrong and that he will deeply regret doing that during the period. Coming. It also indicates that he will make the wrong decision at this time, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. A married woman who sees in a dream that she is wearing a long dress that suits her. She explains that she is going through some good things in her life, and she is happy at the present time with her husband. The dream also indicates To get rid of many of the problems and difficult things that you were seeing and facing. It is as if the dress was loose and she wore it in a dream, and she greatly admired its shape and color in her dream. Here it indicates that she will get rid of many of the problems that she is suffering from at this time in her life. And that she will live A comfortable and quiet life, God willing, and she will be very happy at that time. Interpretation of seeing wearing a dress in a dream for a divorced woman: Seeing a divorced woman wearing a dress in a dream, and it was very delicate and beautiful for her. D- She still dreams of marrying a good man again and making her happy in life. It explains the end of problems and difficult things in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. The dream also shows the calm and happy life that a divorced woman lives during this period. If the dress is long in the dream, this indicates her chastity and chastity between society and the world. If it is short in the dream and its shape Badly, this indicates endless disputes that she will fall into. A tight dress in a dream indicates financial hardship that she will experience and sadness. If the dress is loose and short, it indicates a livelihood that is not in keeping with her, and will end quickly. If a stranger gives her a dress in a dream, this indicates To the person who will propose to her soon.Read

title: Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for a married woman according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for a married woman, according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. Many of us see different dreams and do not know the evidence for them and whether they bring with them something good or bad. Rain in general brings together its goodness and the water of the earth because it is the bounty of the Almighty God to the people and people wait for it year after year. Together for me, the interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for a married woman according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi..Interpretation of the dream of seeing rain in a dream. In general, we find that natural rainfall within the country indicates the wealth and fertility that the citizens of the country will acquire. And if the people of the country suffer from evil or distress, then This dream carries with it good tidings and a sign of consolation, in the event that the rain in the dream does not bring any harm, but this vision brings evil and evil. It indicates increased sadness and anxiety if we see damage in the dream. Of rain. For a woman to see rain in general, it means growth, decent living, and an abundance of good morals. When a woman sees harmful rain in her dream, this indicates a lot of gossip and talk about her. When a woman sees herself bathing in rainwater, This vision indicates her purity and chastity. If the rain is of stone or blood, this indicates a violation of a woman’s modesty, and this vision may indicate disobedience and sins, and seeing the sky from which rain falls in the form of blood indicates war, strife, and injustice. It happens in this place that the dreamer saw. Seeing heavy and hot rain indicates success and goals. Seeing standing in the rain has two different interpretations. Whoever sees himself washing himself from impurity with rain, this is evidence of his repentance and purification, and this is food or money. And when the dreamer washes his face with rain, this is an indication that the person will obtain a need that he wants to obtain. But if you stand alone in the rain, this is evidence of words or talk. Harmful affects the dreamer. When the dreamer sees himself bathing in the rain, this is a sign of youth, vitality, prosperity, and vitality. If a person sees himself drinking rainwater in a dream, this indicates that he will be afflicted with goodness in the state of purity of the water, and if it is cloudy, this means that He will get sick while there. They drank rain water. Interpretation of a dream about seeing rain in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees rain in a dream, this is a good omen and evidence of the stability of life, diet, and psychological and spiritual stability. Perhaps it indicates her closeness to our Lord Almighty in the coming period, either with many memories, or By praying, it indicates her guidance and repentance, which is what our Lord Almighty has accepted. A married wife watching the rain is evidence of her seeking forgiveness and purification. This vision shows the woman’s feeling of contentment and contentment. If a married woman is walking in the rain in a dream, this indicates her efforts and efforts in managing the affairs of Family. For a married woman, rain in a dream indicates that she and her husband will recover from any illness and the problem they are facing will end. If a married woman sees light rain in a dream, this is a sign that she will

If a married woman is walking in the rain in a dream, this indicates her efforts and efforts in managing the affairs of Family. For a married woman, rain in a dream indicates that she and her husband will recover from any illness and the problem they are facing will end.
